page.title: 11INDUSTRY 1
page.content: There are two main industrial estates in our area,Connor's Yard and Jarvis Brook.The ground area for each factory averages 2000 sq.ft. & the number of people employed varies according to size, usually between 3 to 100 but Servomex is the largest with 260.An average daily shift is 8 hours between 0900_1700hrs.Most employees work 10hrs overtime per week.Most factories were established in the 1980's and are the main source of employment in the area. Computers are used to store informa_ tion about accounts and one person is responsible for this.Safety standards are very high, with fire alarms and extinguishers.Workers are not allowed to use dangerous machinery unless they have been trained professionally, even then protective clothing must be worn. Recreational facilities are very poor.
